body: I like the art style but holy fuck, that story was as bad as a story can be. Was this written by a 50-year-old virgin with anxiety and rape fetish? Damn...
Atleast it didn't end up in a bad ending, but the author should've done more with those 2 whores with numbers on their ass. wth happened to them after that scene?
well this was an odd outcome. 😅
Lol, even the last woman is a cheater trash. All those women were trash tbh, so I don’t see why she gets the good outcome.

big breasts - within reason ... group - go away ... glasses - sure, why not ... mosaic censorship - endurable ... double penetration - go away ... milf - sure, why not ... dilf - depends ... collar - yes please ... cheating - depends ... hairy - within reason ... bald - don't care ... old man - depends  (lol) ... smell - go away ... leash - probably not ... VERDICT - love kojima's women & general style, but hate the content & fetish focus a 1000 times more, massive no
In good Kojima Miu's fashion, the plot twist flips things on its head, I love this guy.

cut cut cut, cut cut trim trim trim, trim trim
